tool_description: Optimizes product content for search engines by generating SEO-friendly titles, descriptions, and metadata with keyword integration.

product_content.description: Original product description or content to optimize

optimization_focus.description: SEO focus area: visibility, conversion, or balanced

character_limits.description: Apply standard character limits for titles and descriptions

error_messages: Empty content provided: product_content cannot be empty or whitespace only
Invalid optimization focus: Use one of [visibility, conversion, balanced]
Keyword integration failed: Unable to naturally integrate provided keywords
Content too short: Provide sufficient content for meaningful SEO optimization
usage: Provide product_content and target_keywords; optionally specify optimization_focus and enable character_limits for platform-specific optimization.

meta_keywords.description: Generated meta keywords for the product
